Crappifier
===========

Crappifier `Abstract Base Class <https://docs.python.org/3/library/abc.html>`_ for custom Crappifier implementations.

.. code-block:: python

   from pssr.crappifiers import Crappifier

.. autoclass:: pssr.crappifiers.Crappifier

.. autofunction:: pssr.crappifiers.Crappifier.crappify
